author: vors
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.
- [x] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

There are other cases that requires tweaks, but this one was responsible for a lot of failures in non-escalated sessions.
title: Scope ExecutionPolicy tests to current user to allow it run without admin escalation
